productVariant.inventoryMessage: If inventory management is disabled for a variant, shoppers can always order any quantity of it. If inventory management is enabled, shoppers can only order up to the available quantity, unless you enable back-ordering. All changes on this card take effect immediately. Publishing is not necessary.
productVariant.lowInventoryWarningThresholdLabel: Warn customers that the product will be close to sold out when the available quantity reaches this threshold
productVariant.noInventoryTracking: Inventory is tracked only for sellable variants. Select an option to manage inventory for it.
